page.title: 19Rodbourne B&B Angrove Farm
page.content: We approached{Angrove Farm}by a long narrow country lane, with high hedges on either side.The Farm house was built in the 1800's but Mr. and Mrs. Parfitt have been living on the farm since 1976. Mrs. Parfitt has lived on a farm all her life. She keeps 20 chickens for eggs and 50 for meat. She runs a{Bed and Breakfast}service in the Farm house from May to September. Mrs Parfitt advertises her bed and breakfast service in the{Farm Holiday} magazine and the{Tourist 0ffice}in {Malmesbury.}She likes her guests to stay a week or a fortnight.Her daughter helps her. They also provide Bed, Breakfast and Evening meal.She has been doing this for 3 seasons. Tourists come from as far away as America and Australia.
